For a friday vote on Brett Kavanaugh's Kavanaugh's nomination on the Senate floor the final vote on whether it confirmed him is expected to happen Saturday

Well we don't have any sort of specific snow and this is certainly something that is confidential and not a something that is generally released to the public and there are no plans at this point according to the Judiciary Committee chairman Chuck Grassley for any of this to be made public
A despite clearly a fair amount of interest among Democrats to make this public and certainly I think among the Trump a chunk of the American public to to learn what's in there of what we do know is that publicly at least
A six people have confirmed that they spoke to the FBI many of them are people who are friends of a judge Kavanaugh's during high school that would be mark judge PJ Smith Tim ... and Chris Garrett
A as well as one friend of of Ford's that's legal in Kaiser who all confirmed that they spoke to the FBI and then there's a second woman who made allegations of sexual misconduct against cabin on that's Deborah Ramirez and we know that she also spoke to the FBI now a NPR has learned um that

Know what all

Of this process I'm Ryan what about the seemingly large list of people who said they had or have information relevant
